tooltip_zh: 本层下一次紧急作战中，非领袖敌人的移动速度-50%
tooltip_ja: このエリアでの次の緊急作戦で、非BOSS敵の移動速度-50%
tooltip_en: All non-Boss enemy units have -50% Movement Speed during the next Emergency Operation on this floor

name_ja: クリムゾン『七丘の母狼』
tooltip_zh: 本层下一次紧急作战中，非领袖敌人的生命值+100%，移动速度-75%

tooltip_en: All non-Boss enemy units have +100% HP and -75% Movement Speed during the next Emergency Operation on this floor
